name: Hali and the Loot Imp
description:
This game was built with the love of the #HalifaxCommunity http://www.twitch.com/halifax .  NOTE: The game is still under heavy development.  This game is free to all and forever.  I left the Donation as an option and those who do donate, thank you.  No obligation's to donate!

Game Objective:

Fill inventory bag by collecting loot

Avoid Loot Goblin/beat the blue timer

Exit level without dying

NOTES:

All Power ups/sillyness counts as loot (Health does not)

NEW: There is a secret rare loot item that will give you 100 Loot points and you can skip the level.

CREDITS FOR THE GAME:

Miss McGeek who did all the Pixel Art https://twitter.com/McgeekMiss

Blackshaddow who helped to do the UI parts in the gamehttps://twitter.com/BlackshaddowUK
